item.title: Symbol Overlay (Highlight symbols at cursor point with keymap-enabled overlays in Emacs)
item.description: 今回は（も？），redditで拾ってきたネタ（How to highlight occurences at cursor point in Emacs）．カーソルの位置にあるシンボル（単語と思えば良い）をバ
